nodes.text: Jabba Juice was a non-alcoholic beverage served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. The drink was suitable for human consumption and shared its name with the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure. The beverage included eggs that were supplied fresh daily by a worrt living in a tank above the bar.

Jabba Juice is one of the non-alcoholic beverages sold to customers at the Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. It was first revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019. The menu's description reads, "Simply Orange with pineapple, kiwi, cantaloupe, and blueberry popping pearls," with the pearls playing the part of worrt eggs.
